mosinstall.name: Amazon Associates
mosinstall.author: Stephan Craane
mosinstall.description:
Use {amazon id='########' align='####'} where the id is the amazon id of the product.
You can find the id by searching amazon.com for a product and looking at the url.

The url will look something like this:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00005RIY5/ref=pd_kar_gw_1/002-5997680-7114400?%5Fencoding=UTF8&v=glance&n=130
where the highligted part is the id that you use.

The aligment is optional and will overwrite the default aligment. You can use LEFT or RIGHT

Make sure that you set the Amazon Associates ID or else it will use my Amazon Associates ID (no problem with that ;) )

param.name: site
param.label: Select your Amazon
param.description: Select the Amazon that you are Associates to.

param.name: align
param.label: Align left or right
param.description: Allowes you to set the default aligment

param.name: background
param.label: Background color
param.description: Type the background color. If your not sure, leave default. (FFFFFF)

param.name: text
param.label: Text color
param.description: Type the text color. If your not sure, leave default. (000000)

param.name: link
param.label: Link color
param.description: Type the link color. If your not sure, leave default. (0000FF)
